title: Gauss law - flux thru sphere with 3x the radius

content.question: What is the electric flux through a second sphere of radius <math alttext="3 R" overflow="scroll"> <mn>3</mn> <mi>R</mi> </math>, if the second sphere is centered on the same point charge and also has no additional charged objects within it?

choices.label: <math alttext="9 phi sub R" overflow="scroll"><mn>9</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">Φ</mi><mi>R</mi></msub></math>

unit.text: 8: Electric Charges, Fields, and Gauss's Law

skill.text: 2.D: Predict new values or factors of change of physical quantities using functional dependence between variables.
